page.title: 09Herrington -My Community
page.content: I live in Fletcher Crescent, in a terraced council house. It is a good place to live, the street is always clean and tidy. There are 6 garages in our street and my dad owns one of them. Behind our house are allotments. At the bottom of my street is a farm with hens, horses, dogs and cats. At the top of my street is a{riding {school}with about 40 horses. Over the road from the riding school is Herrington Hill. Here there are woods and a pill-box left over from the war. From Herrington Hill you can walk to Newbottle or the{Club Grounds where there are three bowling greens but only two are used. There are also two football fields. Near the Club Grounds is{Philadelphia Yard}where men repair machinery for the colliery. This is at the back of our house and has been open for over 150 years.
